description: This huge steel knife is basically a shortsword at this point. Its clearly hand-forged with love.

The Ripper vibroblade is a small, handheld, militarized chainsaw that saw extensive use in the armed conflicts before the Great War, with a commercial-grade, scaled-down version made available for the general market. The first Ripper was powered by small energy cells, though later models were self-powered. It can saw through both flesh and metal alike with ease.  If loaded with gas, using this item will cause it to turn on.

use_action.msg: The ripper's cutting blades roar to life!
use_action.need_charges_msg: The ripper refuses to turn on. It needs more gasoline to function.

description: This is a huge two-handed makeshift sword made from a sharpened vertibird rotor blade.

Originally designed for use in industry before seeing use in the resource wars-induced riots in Europe, the thermic lance is a polearm outfitted with a series of heavy-duty thermal heaters, allowing the user to attack enemies at extended range. Requires a battery to function. This thermic lance is currently disabled.

use_action.msg: The thermal lance begins to crackle with immense amounts of heat energy!
use_action.need_charges_msg: The thermic lance's heating electrodes remains inert. It needs more energy to function.
